name: Karl Malone
description: 6'9" power forward, 'The Mailman'. 2nd all-time scorer (36,928 pts). 2x MVP. Legendary pick-and-roll with Stockton. Incredibly muscular, reliable scorer. But 0-3 in Finals, including missed crucial free throws. Always delivered... except when it mattered most.

elbow-jumper.name: Elbow Jumper
elbow-jumper.description: Signature mid-range shot from the elbow
elbow-jumper.prompt: releasing mid-range jumper from the elbow - textbook form, muscular arms extended, the automatic shot that made him second all-time scorer, reliable as clockwork

pick-and-roll.name: Pick and Roll
pick-and-roll.description: Rolling to basket after Stockton screen
pick-and-roll.prompt: rolling hard to basket after setting screen - muscular body in motion, hands ready for pass, the unstoppable pick-and-roll that terrorized the league, partnership perfected

power-dunk.name: Power Dunk
power-dunk.prompt: throwing down ferocious two-handed dunk - veins popping, muscles bulging, the physical specimen destroying the rim, pure power basketball

missed-free-throw.name: The Miss
missed-free-throw.description: 1997 Finals - missed crucial free throws with game on line
missed-free-throw.prompt: at free throw line in crucial moment - ball leaving hands with bad rotation, face showing the weight of pressure, the moment when The Mailman couldn't deliver, destiny slipping away

muscular-pose.name: Physical Specimen
muscular-pose.description: The most muscular player of his era
muscular-pose.prompt: standing showing incredible muscular build - arms folded or flexed, the bodybuilder physique that dominated power forwards, physical intimidation personified

finals-frustration.name: Finals Frustration
finals-frustration.description: The agony of coming up short again
finals-frustration.expression: anguish, so close yet so far
finals-frustration.prompt: showing frustration after Finals loss - head down or hands on hips, the agony of being so good but never good enough, 0-3 in the biggest moments, eternal bridesmaid
